skillTree.name: Locus of Endless War
skillTree.description: Though exiled from Khorne's side, the legacy of Skarbrand's conquests continue to fuel the Blood God's overwhelming power.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +15% after winning a battle

Blood Hosts: +3 units on creation
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.name: Thick Skin
skillTree.description: At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.

skillTree.name: Hates Slaanesh
skillTree.description: Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Fury of Khorne
skillTree.description: Wherever Scyla goes, the blood and the battle of Khorne follows. None may escape the fury of war when the favoured son of the war god is near

skillTree.name: Let the Blood Flow
skillTree.description: Scyla rampages through the weak, battering them into little more than blood for the blood god. The more he kills, the happier Khorne is

skillTree.name: Pile the Dead High
skillTree.description: Scyla has slain many in service to Khorne, and shall slay many more, stacking their skulls at the foot of the Skull Throne

effects.description:
Skulls gained from kills: +30%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Harvester of Souls
skillTree.description: After orchestrating the massacre at Black Gulch, which caused the winding chasm to run red with Skaven blood, Scyla was gifted with massive brute strength and hulking, ape-like arms.

ui_effects.description: Activates when an enemy unit is destroyed within 30 metres

skillTree.name: Khorne's Champion
skillTree.description: The greatest of all the Chaos Spawn who worship Khorne, his example drives others to greater heights of slaughter

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Spawn of Khorne units. 
	(all units in army)

Melee Attack: +10 for Spawn of Khorne units.
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: For the Slaughter!
skillTree.description: Scyla is little more than a mountain of muscle and unquenchable rage, goaded into battle as a beast of war and unleashed to run howling into the ranks of the enemy.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Brutal Charge
skillTree.description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.

skillTree.name: Maim!
skillTree.description: No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!

skillTree.name: Kill!
skillTree.description: "KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"

skillTree.name: Destroy!
skillTree.description: "Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"

skillTree.name: Slaughter!
skillTree.description: With every other thought squeezed from his mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Murder!
skillTree.description: Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.

skillTree.name: Hunt!
skillTree.description: "None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"

skillTree.name: Cleave!
skillTree.description: "Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."

skillTree.name: Crush!
skillTree.description: All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Scyla Anfingrimm
backgroundSkills.description: Scyla is a mindless beast, high in the favour of Khorne, his only desire to kill and maim in the name of his bloodthirsty god, and his destiny unlikely to hold little more than a violent death
